node.text_zh: 政府「保就業」計劃
舉報違反檢疫令情況：電子報案中心／各區警署報案室／致電1823
node.text_en: Report suspected cases of breaching quarantine orders: e-Report Room / Report rooms of police stations / Call 1823

node.text_zh: 在 7 月 29 日至 8 月 11 日期間，任何人進入或身處公眾地方（不論室內或室外）時須一直佩戴口罩。詳情
node.text_en: A person must wear a mask at all times in all public places (indoor or outdoor) for the period from July 29 to August 11. Details

node.text_zh: 在公眾地方進行羣組聚集的人數限制由 4 人收緊至 2 人，由 7 月 29 日起生效。除獲豁免者外，繼續在 7 月 29 日至 8 月 11 日期間內禁止在公眾地方進行羣組聚集。詳情
node.text_en: The number of persons allowed in group gatherings in public places is tightened from four to two, with effective from July 29. Unless exempted, the prohibition on group gatherings at public places will continue from July 29 to August 11. Details
